title: Our Projects
description: At Fyra Labs, we drive positive change through open-source technology and community. Explore our portfolio and see how we're shaping the future.

tau.title: tauOS
tau.description: Discover the future of desktop computing with tauOS, currently indevelopment. tauOS is designed with ease of use in mind, featuring an all-inclusive syncing service that synchronizes files, configurations, keys, and more across all your devices.

um.title: Ultramarine Linux
um.description: Ultramarine Linux is a Fedora-based Linux distribution designed to stay out of your way and be easy to use. With Ultramarine Linux, you can get up and running quickly, and get back to doing what you love, all with the power of Fedora.

terra.title: Terra
terra.description: Terra is a repository for software that goes beyond what's available in Fedora. Experience quality and security with the latest packages, or distribute your own software on Fedora and other RPM-based distributions.
